Reviews.Title: The battery size was wrong.
Reviews.Author: S.F.
Reviews.Content: One of the batteries is wider than needed for battery compartment. It requires a force to insert and does not spring from the camera.

Reviews.Title: Works great for cannon SX280 HS
Reviews.Author: Father of 3 boys
Reviews.Content: Works great for cannon SX280 HS.  This camera eats up batteries when filming videos (not sure why).  With these  higher capacity batteries and the original one I have more than enough to do what I need on a days trip. (although I don't take much video with this).

ProductInfo.Features:
Package Includes: 2 Halcyon Brand Battery & 1 Halcyon Brand Wall & Car Rapid Charger
Battery Specs: 1600 mAh with Premium Japanese Cells
Halcyon Support: Includes 5 Year Halcyon Replacement Warranty. Full Membership Access to Halcyon Customer Support Website
Frustration Free Packaging. No wasteful and dangerous plastic blister packs.
Compatible with all cameras which take Canon NB-6L Batteries
ProductInfo.Name: Two Halcyon 1600 mAH Lithium Ion Replacement Battery and Charger Kit for Canon PowerShot SX280 HS 12.1 MP CMOS Digital Camera and Canon NB-6L
